ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: A survey of advanced Syriac grammar combined with an introduction to a wide variety of Syriac texts. Prepares student to read more difficult texts in all major Syriac scripts. I would recommend the class to any prospective student of Syriac.
If anyone is interested in the early church and text criticism tools, I would be happy to recommend to take this course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Enables me to read a greater variety of early Christian texts.
This course helps me to equip strong language instrument to understand the textual comparison of New Testament and other early church literature.
